info.+content: Shangri-La Frontier Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su
シャングリラ・フロンティア〜クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす〜

Second year high school student Rakurō Hizutome is interested in one thing only: finding "shitty games" and beating the crap out of them. His gaming skills are second to none, and no game is too bad for him to enjoy. So when he's introduced to the new VR game Shangri-La Frontier, he does what he does best—min-maxes and skips the prologue to jump straight into the action. But can even an expert gamer like Rakurō discover all the secrets that Shangri-La Frontier hides... (from manga)
"Haruka na Anata e" (遥かなあなたへ) by Setsuna of Bygone Days [Asami Seto] (ep 19)
『シャングリラ・フロンティア』
